title: Im not an Ornn main but I will be furious if he just got a skin from bad skins lines
body:
He deserves eiter to get project or mecha
if he just got an elderwood skin or smth like that I would be dissapointed
hopefully we see a legendary skin for him

replies.body: Star guardian ornn and yorick , lets goooo !!!!

What constitutes a bad skin line? What some think is bad, others like, and vice versa. 

For example, I typically really like most of the Elderwood skins. Meanwhile, I typically don't care for (doesn't mean don't like/don't want to be a thing) the majority of the stuff from, say, the Project, Program, Dark Star, or Blood Moon skin lines.

Regardless, Ornn probably needs at least two more good quality and theme varying (to offer variety) skins, like yesterday.
Thunder Lord Ornn basically is already that.

T H I C C O R N N
A C O R N N

(what are we doing here again? lol)

>He deserves eiter to get project

Project is only for Human based champions (Yes, Warwick is still one as it is in his lore, Ornn was never human)

Only disappointment from elderwood skin line is nocturne because of his sh;tty arms...

https://devtrackers.gg/leagueoflegends/p/e890a071-elderwood-ornn-by-natalie-pellmann lol

Mecha Kingdoms Ornn would have been appropriate.
However I do have to say that elderwood is one of my fav themes. Awesome blend of creepy/sexy skins with that dark fairy tale vibe.

ornn blows fire with his mouth
if he got an elderwood skin,what would he do?blow flowers?

Spores. But yes, flowers/pollen, all of that would look very attractive.
I mean he puts 'brittle' on people making them more susceptible to cc. Blowing paralyzing spores at them makes more sense than fire does anyway.

do u really think an ornn main would like to get a skin where ornn blows flower?
Like imagine maining zed and he gets a star guardian
IMAGINE IT

It's all about execution.

Suppose they turned him into some evil Baphomet looking deity (dark scary goat being since he already has horns).
His Q could summon up a gnared treeroot, W he'd blow spores, and ult he can summon some sort of stag or something.
Could be very cool.

Like I said, Ornn really couldn't easily been with the mecha kingdom line, but I think Elderwood is great for any champ.

Elderwood Ornn is coming. The concept art for it was leaked along with Hextech Swain's, and the artist basically confirmed it.

Also PROJECT is human only. Warwick is and always will be the only exception, as was confirmed by Riot.
You sweet summer child. Go sit down. Ivern already went through with this hell with Dunkmaster, so don't hold your breath.

Ornn should definitely get an elderwood skin, and not something lame like Mecha although it could work. 

Ideal skin lines for him would be Cosmic, Battlecast, Elderwood, Guardian of the Sands, or something original and unexpected. 
Dark Waters/Deep Sea, maybe a reference to something
